attributes.action: GM food to be ate by politicians for a year before the general public .
attributes.additional_details: GM foods have already been proven in America to give rats cancer of the organs and cancerous tumors . If politicians are going to go ahead with bringing GM poison into our food supply then it should be ate only by politicians and their families for a year before it is forced on the general public . A only GM menu should be set up in parliament restaurants and their food allowence should be restriced to only GM food or they have it removed .
